summary: This project enhances MkDocs documentation with AI-driven features like automatic summary generation and intelligent reading statistics. It supports multiple AI services, multi-language summaries, content cleaning, and fallback mechanisms. The tool provides flexible configuration options and intelligent caching. Reading statistics include character counting, code detection, and reading time estimation. Smart features adapt to different environments, recognize languages, and detect content types. Installation involves direct download or Git clone methods. Configuration includes setting up hooks, local configurations, and choosing AI services.
